info.name: Wakapi
info.description: Enables Wakapi time tracking of time spent in support channels.

changelog.title: Sample Rate
items: add smaple rate setting for less network usage

changelog.title: Settings
items: added discord settings to enable what channel names on which guilds are tracked

changelog.title: Tracking on other guilds
items: Fixed bug where the plugin tracked time spent in support channels on other guilds

settings.name: Wakapi API Key
settings.note: API Key needed to interact with Wakapi

settings.name: Wakapi Url
settings.note: API Url where your Wakapi instance lives

settings.name: Tracking Guilds
settings.note: The guild(s) in which you want to track your time. IDs! For multiple guilds, just seperate the guild IDs by comma. If left empty the plugin tracks the time on all guilds.

settings.name: Category Names
settings.note: Put the category names that indicate a support category and trigger the time tracking action here. For more than one just seperate them by comma.

settings.name: Project Mapping
settings.note: If you want to map the tracked guilds to a certain project, put them in here like so: {GUILID} => {PROJECTNAME}. If left empty, the project shown in wakapi will be "tickets".
